title: Women Bear the Burden of America's Childcare Crisis | Dax Shepard
itunes:title: Women Bear the Burden of America's Childcare Crisis | Dax Shepard
description:
Trevor explores the longstanding childcare crisis in the U.S., Desi Lydic offers rehab services to entitled "Karens," and Dax Shepard talks about "Top Gear America" and "Armchair Expert."


Please visit dailyshow.com/DreamingOutLoud to help provide healthy food, sustainable food systems and economic opportunity to marginalized communities.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
